title: Rethinking Transformer for Long Contextual Histopathology Whole Slide Image Analysis
details: H Li, Y Zhang, P Chen, Z Shui, C Zhu, L Yang - arXiv preprint arXiv:2410.14195, 2024
abstract: Histopathology Whole Slide Image (WSI) analysis serves as the gold standard for clinical cancer diagnosis in the daily routines of doctors. To develop computer-aided diagnosis model for WSIs, previous methods typically employ Multi-Instance …
